description: For science majors, learning to read the primary literature and other professional sources is an important transition from classroom learning to post-graduate endeavors. Students read, present, and discuss scientific literature in a field selected by participating faculty. The goal is to garner sufficient expertise to allow critical analysis of the particular field. May be repeated if topic is different. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor.
name: Top: Bio in South India
notes: Registration by permission of instructor only.
title: Topics in Biological Research
